page.title: 14Kylestrome Estate
page.content: A large, private, sporting estate, Kylestrome Estate, covers half of our section and beyond. Kylestrome Estate, part of the Westminster Estates is one of the largest employers in the area, employing eight people full-time, as well as having some seasonal workers. There is an annual cull of forty stags and forty hinds, only the older animals being killed. Because of the environment, no grouse shooting is done. Shelter belts of private forestry give the deer some protection from the weather. A flock of breeding black_faced ewes keeps the shepherd busy. Electricity has been generated privately at Kylestrome since 1920, using the Maldie, a fast flowing burn, to turn the turbines. Only after a very dry spell is the diesel generator in use.
